alert.note: Alert for Central and Southern Lewis and Clark; Jefferson (Montana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 07 at 6:13PM MDT by NWS GreatFalls
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southeastern Lewis and Clark and north central Jefferson Counties through 645 PM MDT... At 612 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 8 miles west of Helena, moving northeast at 15 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Helena, East Helena, Montana City, Marysville, Spring Meadow Lake State Park, Canyon Creek and Austin. This includes the following highways... Interstate 15 between mile markers 188 and 207. Highway 12 between mile markers 29 and 53. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. A Severe Thunderstorm Watch remains in effect until 900 PM MDT for southwestern and west central Montana.
